healing_spring.description: You find a serene spring. The water glows faintly.

Leave it.result_text: You decide not to risk it and move on.

strange_idol.description: You find a small, unsettling idol carved from black stone. It seems to whisper to you.

Pray to the idol..description: You kneel and offer a prayer. A chilling energy fills you, followed by a surge of power.

Accept its dark gift (+2 STR, -10 Max HP.result_text: You feel stronger, but a part of your vitality is drained away.

Reject the power.result_text: You recoil from the unnatural feeling and leave the idol behind.

Smash the idol..result_text: You shatter the idol under your heel. The whispers cease.

goblin_chieftain_ambush.description: A hulking goblin with a cruel-looking axe points at you. 'Get 'em, boys!'

tier1_troll_lair.description: The ground trembles as a massive Cave Troll emerges from the darkness!
